mutants.code:
import string

def reverse_text(input_text):
    s = input_text.translate(str.maketrans('MUTATED', '', string.punctuation))
    s = s.lower()
    s = s[::-1]
    return s

import string

def reverse_text(input_text):
    s = input_text.translate(str.maketrans('', '', string.punctuation))
    s = s.lower()
    s = s[::--1]
    return s
